summary: A sexy lore-unfriendly based follower. Default place: Whiterun\'s [b]Bannered Mare[/b]
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21440-1-1343783827.jpg[/img]
I was bored. I always admired Jarl Elisif\'s face, so I modified it a bit.
I forgot to mention in the original post that her default place is in Whiterun\'s [b]Bannered Mare[/b]
This is my first modding experience ever, aside from nuking my favorite items\' stats so that I\'m godlike. Also, I apologize for the ridiculous video intro, it was my first-ever take with AE and I didn\'t have any resources or guides to see because my internet had crashed. It\'s pretty simple really, just a follower based on Elisif. Bear in mind that I removed Elisif\'s default clothes so my NPC, Erica, will spawn in your game [i]naked[/i]. If you want her to have the same armor and cloak I used in the video, get the plugins I mentioned.

Credits/Mods used:

basskimm, for his incredible [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038]Girls of Skyrim[/url] mod.
TH3WICK3D1/McAngus(I don\'t know who :$)\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17259]Blue Stripes Elite All Colors[/url].
apachii, for his amazing [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url].
cazy and zzjay, for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19623]Cazy hairs and demoness hairs conversion[/url].
dimon99, for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP Body[/url].[B]NSFW[/B]
nivea, for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter is Coming Cloaks[/url].
BellaGail, for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females[/url].
author: xNodus
